name: Ludo Champion King
description:
Ludo champion king is one of the best board games people can play. Ludo is simple yet challenging and entertaining. The game brings you a unique experience each time you play as it has many variations, play the traditional dice game of childhood. You need to strategize, think and use your brain to win this game!

Ludo app supports offline mode. In the offline mode of game ludo, the player can play with a computer bot or local multiplayer (pass and play). In ludo online mode, the game is played between 2 to 4 players, and you can play against your friends, family, and relatives or even against people from around the world
